team_health_questions.title: Support
team_health_questions.example_good: We always get great support and help when we ask for it!
team_health_questions.example_bad: We keep getting stuck because we can't get the support and help that we ask for.

team_health_questions.title: Teamwork
team_health_questions.example_good: We are a totally gelled super-team with awesome collaboration!
team_health_questions.example_bad: We are a bunch of individuals that neither know nor care about what the other people in the squad are doing.

team_health_questions.title: Pawns or players
team_health_questions.example_good: We are in control of our own destiny! We decide what to build and how to build it.
team_health_questions.example_bad: We are just pawns in a game of chess with no influence over what we build or how we build it.

team_health_questions.title: Mission
team_health_questions.example_good: We know exactly why we are here and weâ€™re really excited about it!
team_health_questions.example_bad: We have no idea why we are here, there's no high picture or focus. Our so called mission is completely unclear and uninspiring.

team_health_questions.title: Suitable process
team_health_questions.example_good: Our way of working fits us perfectly!

team_health_questions.title: Delivering value
team_health_questions.example_good: We deliver great stuff! We're proud of it and our stakeholders are really happy.
team_health_questions.example_bad: We deliver crap. We feel ashamed to deliver it. Our stakeholders hate us.

team_health_questions.title: Learning
team_health_questions.example_good: We're learning lots of interesting stuff all the time!
team_health_questions.example_bad: We never have time to learn anything.

team_health_questions.title: Speed
team_health_questions.example_good: We get stuff done really quickly! No waiting and no delays. We never seem to get anything done.
team_health_questions.example_bad: We keep getting stuck or interrupted. Stories keep getting stuck on dependencies.

team_health_questions.title: Fun
team_health_questions.example_good: We love going to work and have great fun working together!
